product_name: La Roche-PosayEffaclar Cleansing Foaming Facial Cleanser for Oily Skin
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganHSA/FSA eligibleLa Roche-Posay Effaclar Cleansing Foaming Facial Cleanser for Oily Skin is a daily face cleanser for oily and acne prone skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsCleanser for oily skin that thoroughly cleanses skinTested on sensitive skinDermatologist testedKey IngredientsGlycerin, provides moisture to the skinCoco-glucoside, helps to thoroughly cleanse the skinFormulated WithoutParabensItem 2620401How To UseStep 1: Lather the cream with lukewarm water between palms and apply to wet face, massaging the skin gently. Step 2: Rinse thoroughly with water and dry without rubbing. Cleanse morning and eveningIngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Myristic Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Stearic Acid, Lauric Acid, Palmitic Acid, Coco-Glucoside, Tetrasodium Edta, Salicylic Acid, Parfum/Fragrance.
how_to_use: Step 1: Lather the cream with lukewarm water between palms and apply to wet face, massaging the skin gently. Step 2: Rinse thoroughly with water and dry without rubbing. Cleanse morning and evening

reviews.headline: This stuff is great!
reviews.comments: I have oily skin and am 50 years old. This feels calming and soothing and has already (in 2 days) made the blackheads on my nose less visible. I use it when washing my face at the sink, but am also considering using a 2nd bottle in the shower for the acne and clogged pores on my back and shoulders.

reviews.headline: The best for oily skin
reviews.comments: This cleanser might be too harsh for regular skin, but it is the holy grail for my very oily skin. I have been getting fewer breakouts since I switched to this cleanser. It also smells nice and I like the foaming action. A little goes a long way, so I think the size is fine. Because of how much it foams up, you need less than a pea sized amount.

reviews.headline: Love this stuff!!!
reviews.comments: I love how creamy and foamy this face wash is when I rub it on my face. It leaves the perfect balance of clean and soft.

reviews.headline: Glad I tried this...it's a keeper
reviews.comments: I'm 60-plus and acne-prone since my teens.  Recently my acne has become more troublesome and I've tried everything to resolve the issue.  After reading other reviews I decided to try it.  2 weeks in of twice-daily use and I see improvement in reduction of breakouts as well as improved skin clarity.  Very glad I tried this!

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I love this! I have struggled with acne my WHOLE life. This is the only product that actually works. I use it twice a day. During my morning routine I also use Mario Badescu glycolic acid toner and Mario Badescu oil free moisturizer. This has been a life changer for me. I had to use it for a couple of weeks to start to see a difference. I hope they never stop making it. Simply wonderful!! :)

reviews.headline: Leaves my face feeling smooth
reviews.comments: You only need a pea sized amount. Slowly add more water and wash for at least a min. You pay for the good stuff, let it get in your skin before you wash it away!

reviews.headline: Clean clear skin
reviews.comments: My face was breaking out a ton so I finally splurged on this facewash. I had read so many good things about it but didn't want to pay the price. I gave in and I'm glad I did. My skin is clearing up and looks better than it has in a while. I just wish I could get rid of my blackheads with this cleanser.

reviews.headline: This stuff is AWESOME!
reviews.comments: I love this stuff! My cousin from out of state left a bottle at my house and I've been using it for the past 8 months twice a day. I haven't had any large breakouts in that time. Not that I have bad acne, but I would occasionally get large cyst like pimples near my nose. :( I can't say enough good things about this stuff. I'm buying some tomorrow. It's worth every penny!

reviews.headline: THe ONLY thing that has worked
reviews.comments: I have had terrible trouble with skin cleansers for what seems like forever and a day, until i read all of these reviews and bought this product. LET ME TELL YOU, this stuff *points with thumb and a smug look* this stuff is great. I've been using it for 3 weeks, and although i still have minor acnes shenanigans once in a while, for te most part my skin is clear, moisturized and overall the best for my skin. Which, my skin, is combination, super sensitve and prone to blackheads and the like. gross right? but, i havent had any of these problems since using this product. and you use so little of it... So if you're THAT girl, that's like hemming and hawing over whether or not to slap down the money for this miracle worker and get the results you want, well here is my suggestion, DONT BE THAT GIRL. just buy it. trust me.

reviews.headline: Performs exactly as described
reviews.comments: This is a great foamy face wash that rinses clean and has no parabens. Light, non-offensive scent that doesn't stay on skin.  Only a tiny dab is needed.  This product should last a long time.

reviews.headline: My skin looks great!
reviews.comments:
I have combination skin, it has been an excellent cleanser, my skin looks smooth, lighter and my pores look tight!! My skin is not dry after I use it. Even my boyfriend has noticed the difference. 
Remember that cleanser products don't need to be in your skin more than 10 seconds, do a gentel massage, the gentel you treat your skin the better it would look!!

faceoff_positive.comments: I have had terrible trouble with skin cleansers for what seems like forever and a day, until i read all of these reviews and bought this product. LET ME TELL YOU, this stuff *points with thumb and a smug look* this stuff is great. I've been using it for 3 weeks, and although i still have minor acnes shenanigans once in a while, for te most part my skin is clear, moisturized and overall the best for my skin. Which, my skin, is combination, super sensitve and prone to blackheads and the like. gross right? but, i havent had any of these problems since using this product. and you use so little of it... So if you're THAT girl, that's like hemming and hawing over whether or not to slap down the money for this miracle worker and get the results you want, well here is my suggestion, DONT BE THAT GIRL. just buy it. trust me.
faceoff_positive.headline: THe ONLY thing that has worked

faceoff_negative.comments: This cleanser is definitely not the right one for me. Even though I have a really oily t-zone, this is way too drying for me. It makes my skin all tight and dry afterwards. I really like the scent of this, but I also wish it was scented at the same time as fragrance isn't good for the skin. If you like foaming cleansers and want a cleanser that leaves your skin squeaky clean, then I guess this one is right for you, but is just isn't for me.
faceoff_negative.headline: This cleanser is...

rollup.name: Effaclar Cleansing Foaming Facial Cleanser for Oily Skin
